title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Mens Jeans Slim Fit - 2-Way Stretch Denim Jeans for Men Slim Fit - Men's Jeans 5-Pocket
description: Mens Slim Fit Jeans: Slim-fitting stretch denim jean features a low rise waist, slim fit in the thigh, and tapered leg that narrows below the knee and fits close at the ankle. Overall look is modern and well suited for daytime wear and going out at night.
2-Way Stretch Denim: Men's stretch jeans boast two-way stretch for a flexible fit that moves with you. Stretch denim has a soft feel for comfort.

Soft Cotton-Poly Black Stretch Denim: Comprised of cotton, polyester, and spandex, comfy and flexible stretch denim is machine washable for easy care. Poplar is a clean black wash with tonal topstitching.
Classic 5-Pocket Jean Design: Slim fit jeans have a classic five-pocket construction with front hand pockets, front coin pocket, and back patch pockets.
Zip Fly: Kenneth Cole Reaction jeans for men have a zip fly with waist button closure. Belt-loop waistband sports a logo tab at back.
